Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires new residential construction sellers to inform buyers of any price increase caused by tariffs on building materials
Summary: Requires sellers of new residential construction to inform buyers of any price increase caused by tariffs on building materials.
LawCode: Add ยง396-sss, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring new residential construction sellers to inform buyers of any price increase caused by tariffs on building materials
